Package fr.umlv.escape.weapon

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Shootable
    Interface representing a shoot behaviour that all objects that can shoot should implements.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicMissile
    Represent a basic missile who extends of Bullet
    BatShipShoot
    This class represent alternating left and right shoot.
    Bullet
    Represent a Bullet
    BulletsFactory
    Bullet's factory
    DoNotShoot
    This class represent an object that can't shoot.
    FireBall
    Represent a fire ball who extends of Bullet
    FirstBossShoot
    Class that represent the shoot behavior of the first boss
    FlameThrower
    Represent a flame thrower who are an extend of weapon
    LaserBeam
    Represent a Laser Beam who are an extend of weapon
    ListWeapon
    Represent all the Ship's Weapons and his current Weapon
    MissileLauncher
    Represent a missile launcher who are an extend of weapon
    SecondBossShoot
    Class that represent the shoot behavior of the second boss
    Shiboleet
    Represent a Shiboleet who extends of Bullet
    ShiboleetThrower
    Represent a shiboleet thrower who are an extend of weapon
    ShootDown
    Class that represent a down shoot.
    ShootPlayer
    Class that represent the shoot behavior of the Player.
    ThirdBossShoot
    Class that represent the shoot behavior of the third boss
    Weapon
    This class represent the structure of a weapon.
    WeaponsFactory
    Factory of Weapon
    XRay
    Represent a XRay who extends of Bullet
